meanings.definition: To put or keep out of sight; conceal from the view or notice of others.
meanings.sent1: The cat hides behind the couch when it's scared.
meanings.sent2: She hides her toys under the bed to keep them safe.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hides the acorns in the flowerpot.
meanings.sent4: His smile hides the sadness in his eyes.
meanings.sent5: The magician hides the coin in his palm with a sleight of hand.

meanings.definition: The skin of an animal, especially the tough, thick skin or pelt of a large animal.
meanings.sent1: The hunter admired the bear's thick hides.
meanings.sent2: The leather jacket was made from cow hides.
meanings.sent3: The old book had a cover made of hides.
meanings.sent4: The knight's armor was crafted from dragon hides.
meanings.sent5: The tent was waterproofed with animal hides.
